itemListElement.name: Khichdi in a Jar – Mixed Vegetable Kitchari Mix for Instant Pot or Saucepan

@graph.name: Khichdi in a Jar - Mixed Veg Kitchari Mix for Instant Pot or Saucepan
@graph.description: Khichdi in a Jar - Mixed Vegetable Kitchari Mix for Instant Pot or Saucepan. Easy Lentil Rice Soup with Veggies. Spiced Risotto. Gift the jar full of lentils,, rice and spices. Empty into a pot with veggies of choice. Easy Weekday Dinner.  Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup long grain white basmati rice
3/4 cup quick cooking lentils such as Red lentils (, (I generally use half moong dal and half red lentils))
1/2 tsp garam masala (, more if you like it spicier)
water ((depends on method of cooking,, see instructions))

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the jar: Layer the rice and lentils.
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble the jar: Layer the rice and lentils.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the cumin seeds and cloves on stove top over medium heat until cumin seeds change color slightly. This step is optional. Toasted cumin seeds add a deeper tastier flavor. Cool completely.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the cumin seeds and cloves on stove top over medium heat until cumin seeds change color slightly. This step is optional. Toasted cumin seeds add a deeper tastier flavor. Cool completely.

recipeInstructions.text: Add toasted cumin, cloves, rest of the spices to small ziplock bag and add to the jar. Close the lid. Store for upto 3 months.
recipeInstructions.name: Add toasted cumin, cloves, rest of the spices to small ziplock bag and add to the jar. Close the lid. Store for upto 3 months.

recipeInstructions.text: Instructions to make the khichdi On the jar: Wash the lentils and rice, (optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Instructions to make the khichdi On the jar: Wash the lentils and rice, (optional).

recipeInstructions.text: To the Instant pot, Add 3.5 to 4 cups water (depends on your preference of consistency of the stew), washed lentils & rice, spice bag contents, 3/4 to 1 tsp salt and 1 tomato finely chopped. Add upto 2 cups of chopped vegetables and mix in. Close the lid and cook on hi pressure for 2-4 minutes (4 for indian khichdi style mash consistency). For a regular rice and dal style kitchari, pressure cook on Low pressure for 3 mins. Release the pressure after 5 mins. Fluff lightly.(For Saucepan, add 5 cups of water instead of 3.5 and the rest of the ingredients as above. Cover partially and cook for 22 minutes, then check the consistency and doneness and continue to cook more until done.).
recipeInstructions.name: To the Instant pot, Add 3.5 to 4 cups water (depends on your preference of consistency of the stew), washed lentils & rice, spice bag contents, 3/4 to 1 tsp salt and 1 tomato finely chopped. Add upto 2 cups of chopped vegetables and mix in. Close the lid and cook on hi pressure for 2-4 minutes (4 for indian khichdi style mash consistency). For a regular rice and dal style kitchari, pressure cook on Low pressure for 3 mins. Release the pressure after 5 mins. Fluff lightly.(For Saucepan, add 5 cups of water instead of 3.5 and the rest of the ingredients as above. Cover partially and cook for 22 minutes, then check the consistency and doneness and continue to cook more until done.).

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro, lemon juice and pepper flakes and serve as is or with chutneys, or papadums/crackers.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with cilantro, lemon juice and pepper flakes and serve as is or with chutneys, or papadums/crackers.

recipeInstructions.text: To make directly: Assemble the ingredients. Heat 1 tsp oil on saute in IP, or saucepan on medium. Add the cumin seeds and cloves and cook until fragrant. Add bay leaves, turmeric and garam masala and mix for a few seconds. Add the rest of the ingredients, water, salt and cook as step 5.
recipeInstructions.name: To make directly: Assemble the ingredients. Heat 1 tsp oil on saute in IP, or saucepan on medium. Add the cumin seeds and cloves and cook until fragrant. Add bay leaves, turmeric and garam masala and mix for a few seconds. Add the rest of the ingredients, water, salt and cook as step 5.
